description: Try our easy to follow Beef Koftas with Mint Yoghurt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Rice,Mince,Egg free,Tomato,Beef
name: Beef Koftas with Mint Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup flat leaf parsley, finely chopped
1 lemon, rind finely grated (plus 2 tbs of lemon juice)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine yoghurt and half a cup of mint leaves in a bowl. Cover and refrigerate for 20 minutes or until needed.
Combine mince, onion, parsley, remaining mint, lemon rind, lemon juice and spices in a large bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Divide mixture into 8 even portions and shape into sausage shapes.

Heat a large non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Spray koftas with olive oil spray. Cook, in two batches, for 8 minutes until browned and cooked through. Transfer to a large plate and cover to keep warm.
Spoon rice onto serving plates. Top with koftas and serve with minted yoghurt and tomato wedges. Sprinkle with mint leaves and serve.
